resources.string:
This sample app illustrates how to recognize and track English words in real time. As words are recognized they are added to the list of words at the bottom of the screen.

To use this app:

1. Find the word you would like to recognize

2. Center the word in the viewing window

3. The word will be outlined, tracked and added to the list at the bottom of the screen

Test content is available at developer.vuforia.com/resources/sample-apps

© 2013 Qualcomm Austria Research Center GmbH. All rights reserved.
Subject to agreements at developer.vuforia.com/legal/EULA "

This sample application shows how to play a video in AR mode.\n\nDevices that support video on texture can play the video directly on the image target. Other devices will play the video in full screen mode.
